name: Mania Slots
description:
------Mania Slots has arrived!!!------


------NEW PLAYER CAMPAIGN------
NOW, you can get a 10,000 coins (worth $0.99) when you login the game at the first time.
Join a unforgettable adventure in Mania Slots to collecting coins along the way!


The excitement of Mania slots now is on your phone.
JUST TAP TO SPIN
OR SWIPE YOUR FINGER ACROSS THE REELS AND DRAW LINES TO BET FROM THE ROUND two OF “LOST MAYAN"


Spin the reels and participate in the mini-games,
Stacked Symbols, expanded Wild, 3x3 reels .
You will feel thrill of our exclusive and original design.
Fun, amusing and entertainment!


------Key Features------
* Free spin to bet .
* Draw lines to bet from the round two of “Lost Mayan” as well.
* 100% FREE to download and play.
* Play anytime, anywhere.
* Can Play Offline with no internet connection.
* Top-tier game dynamic.
* Gorgeous graphics.
* Smooth animations.
* Fantastic bonus.
* Splendid sounds.
* Double up/Gamble.


SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR???
Just get Mania Slots!!!
Download now !!!


Don’t forget to rate the app and give us your feedback!
We always love to hear your comments, and help us to make the game better!
Thanks for playing Mania Slots!
Good luck!
